3: Traces of battles have extended all this way. That's the other side of the fork in the road we passed.
Look at the walls. There are fresh marks apart from bullet holes and signs of explosives.
It seems that Kamui was also heading in this direction.
She said she needed to help Rohacchi search for a mural, so she wasn't coming with us this time. That way, she could also help us divert some of the Corrupted.
Time is short, everyone. I'll be heading out first.
Hold on, Bianca. It's not a good idea to journey alone.
Which is why I have to go first. The Purifying Force excels at pursuits—I'll save much more time travelling by myself.
No one can guarantee how stable Kamui is at this point. If he's indeed down this path, I cannot let Karen take on him alone.
...Stay safe. We'll catch up as quickly as possible.
